TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit LazyInitializer extends System.Object
public ref class LazyInitializer abstract sealed

remarks.format:
## Remarks These routines avoid needing to allocate a dedicated, lazy-initialization instance, instead using references to ensure targets have been initialized as they are accessed.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use EnsureInitialized to lazily initialize a value using a Boolean value to track whether initialization has already happened and an object to use as the mutual exclusion lock.
```vb Dim _data As ExpensiveData = Nothing Dim _dataInitialized As Boolean = False Dim _dataLock As Object = Nothing ' ... Dim name = LazyInitializer.EnsureInitialized(_data, _dataInitialized, _dataLock) ```
```csharp ExpensiveData _data = null; bool _dataInitialized = false; object _dataLock = new object(); // ...
ExpensiveData dataToUse = LazyInitializer.EnsureInitialized(ref _data, ref _dataInitialized, ref _dataLock); ```

Docs.threadsafe: The methods of are thread-safe and may be called from multiple threads concurrently.

Docs.summary: Initializes a target type if it hasn't already been initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: public static T EnsureInitialized<T> (ref T target) where T : class;
.method public static hidebysig !!T EnsureInitialized<class T>(!!T& target) cil managed
Public Shared Function EnsureInitialized(Of T As Class) (ByRef target As T) As T
static member EnsureInitialized : -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

Docs.typeparam: The type of the reference to be initialized.
Docs.param: A reference of type T to initialize if it has not already been initialized.
Docs.summary: Initializes a target reference type with the type's default constructor if it hasn't already been initialized.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method may only be used on reference types. To ensure initialization of value types, see other overloads of EnsureInitialized.
This method may be used concurrently by multiple threads to initialize `target`.
In the event that multiple threads access this method concurrently, multiple instances of `T` may be created, but only one will be stored into `target`. In such an occurrence, this method will not dispose of the objects that were not stored. If such objects must be disposed, it is up to the caller to determine if an object was not used and to then dispose of the object appropriately.

Docs.exception: Permissions to access the constructor of type were missing.
Type does not have a default constructor.

static member EnsureInitialized : * Func<'T (requires 'T : null)> -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

Docs.typeparam: The reference type of the reference to be initialized.
Docs.param: The reference of type T to initialize if it hasn't already been initialized.
The function that is called to initialize the reference.
Docs.summary: Initializes a target reference type by using a specified function if it hasn't already been initialized.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method may only be used on reference types, and `valueFactory` may not return a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic). To ensure initialization of value types or to allow null reference types, see other overloads of EnsureInitialized.
This method may be used concurrently by multiple threads to initialize `target`.
In the event that multiple threads access this method concurrently, multiple instances of `T` may be created, but only one will be stored into `target`. In such an occurrence, this method will not dispose of the objects that were not stored. If such objects must be disposed, it is up to the caller to determine if an object was not used and to then dispose of the object appropriately.

Docs.exception: Type does not have a default constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public static T EnsureInitialized<T> (ref T target, ref bool initialized, ref object syncLock);
.method public static hidebysig !!T EnsureInitialized<T>(!!T& target, bool& initialized, object& syncLock) cil managed
Public Shared Function EnsureInitialized(Of T) (ByRef target As T, ByRef initialized As Boolean, ByRef syncLock As Object) As T
static member EnsureInitialized : * * -> 'T

Docs.typeparam: The type of the reference to be initialized.
Docs.param: A reference or value of type T to initialize if it hasn't already been initialized.
A reference to a Boolean value that determines whether the target has already been initialized.
A reference to an object used as the mutually exclusive lock for initializing . If is , a new object will be instantiated.
Docs.summary: Initializes a target reference or value type with its default constructor if it hasn't already been initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If `initialized` is specified as true, then no further initialization occurs.

Docs.exception: Permissions to access the constructor of type were missing.
Type does not have a default constructor.
